account_id.description: Secret account ID used to authenticate with the API. (Required if `mullvad_account` resource is not used.)

expires_at.description: Timestamp (RFC3339) at which the account expires, without new payment.

is_active.description: Whether the Mullvad account is active.

is_subscription_unpaid.description: Whether payment is due on the subscription method (if applicable).

max_forwarding_ports.description: Maximum number of forwarding ports which may be configured.

max_wireguard_peers.description: Maximum number of WireGuard peers which may be configured.

subscription_method.description: Method used to pay the subscription, if there is one.

block.description: Provides access to a Mullvad account. Required if the provider is not configured with an `account_id`.

city_code.description: Mullvad's code for the city in which the relay to which the forwarding target will connect is located, e.g. `"lon"` for London.

country_code.description: Country code (ISO3166-1 Alpha-2) in which the relay to which the forwarding target will connect is located.

peer.description: The public key of the WireGuard peer, if any, to assign forward this port to. (Required for WireGuard; not applicable for OpenVPN connections.

port.description: The integer value of the port that will be forwarded.

block.description: Provides a Mullvad port forward resource. This can be used to create, read, update, and delete forwarding ports on your Mullvad account.

created.description: The date the peer was registered.

ipv4_address.description: The IPv4 address the registered peer may use (its `AllowedIPs` value to Mullvad's peers).

ipv6_address.description: The IPv6 address the registered peer may use (its `AllowedIPs` value to Mullvad's peers).

ports.description: The ports forwarded for the registered peer.

public_key.description: The public key of the WireGuard peer to register.

block.description: Provides a Mullvad WireGuard resource. This can be used to create, read, and delete WireGuard keys on your Mullvad account.

expires_at.description: Timestamp (RFC3339) at which the account expires, without new payment.

is_active.description: Whether the Mullvad account is active.

is_subscription_unpaid.description: Whether payment is due on the subscription method (if applicable).

max_forwarding_ports.description: Maximum number of forwarding ports which may be configured.

max_wireguard_peers.description: Maximum number of WireGuard peers which may be configured.

subscription_method.description: Method used to pay the subscription, if there is one.

city_code.description: The 3-letter code used to refer to the city in Mullvad's API.

name.description: Name of the city to lookup.

block.description: Mullvad location codes by city name.

city_name.description: City in which the returned relays should be located.

country_code.description: Country code (ISO3166-1 Alpha-2) in which the returned relays should be located.

type.description: Type of VPN that the returned relays should be operating - e.g. `"wireguard"`, `"openvpn"`.

block.description: Filter to apply to the available relays.
Optionally filtered list of Mullvad servers.
